question: How was your first interaction with the Faculty?
response: To be honest, my first interaction with the faculty was quite shocking. It was an entirely new environment, and the challenges were evident. I gradually managed to overcome them and get accustomed to what college life entails.

question: How was your first interaction with the League?
response: Regarding the league, everything went better than I expected. I liked everything about this community from the very beginning. I knew I wanted to be a part of a strong and well-known group that does something meaningful and from which I can learn useful things. It turned out to be just that.

question: How was your first interaction with the IT Department?
response: The first interaction with the IT Department was magical. I didn't think I could find such SMART people as I did. They are extremely passionate about everything they do, and that made me very happy. I was initially afraid because of the unknown, but in the end, everything turned out to be fine.

question: How can I contact you?
response: You can leave me a message in the Contact section of this website, and I will get back to you with more details.
